Package arkivmester

Class ReportModel.Chapter

java.lang.Object
arkivmester.ReportModel.Chapter
Enclosing class:
ReportModel
public static class ReportModel.Chapter
extends java.lang.Object
Class for handling every ChapterList.

  • Method Details

    • deactivate

      public void deactivate()
      Makes it so that chapter does not get printed on the end-report.

    • changeTitle

      public void changeTitle​(java.lang.String text)
      Changes name of the title.
      Parameters:
      text - - the name given.

    • addSection

      public void addSection()
      Adds a section to the chapter.

    • fillSection

      public void fillSection​(java.util.List<java.lang.String> ls, arkivmester.ReportModel.TextStyle type, int col, org.openxmlformats.schemas.drawingml.x2006.chart.CTChart chart)
      Fills the section with content.
      Parameters:
      ls - - a list of paragraphs which is inside that given section.
      type - - type of text.
      col - - used for table and graph to decide how many different columns are needed.
      chart - - null if not used, or chart if it exists in that section.

    • placeInEmptySection

      public void placeInEmptySection​(org.openxmlformats.schemas.drawingml.x2006.chart.CTChart chart)
      Looks for an empty section which has been created earlier and sets chart content in it.
      Parameters:
      chart - - chart information.

    • insertInput

      public void insertInput​(org.apache.poi.xwpf.usermodel.XWPFParagraph paragraph)
      Looks for "TO-DO" text inside a specific chapter section in document and replaces it with new text.
      Parameters:
      paragraph - - new text to replace the old one with.

    • insertParagraph

      public void insertParagraph​(int sect, java.util.List<java.lang.String> input)
      Inserts input inside a section of a chapter.
      Parameters:
      sect - - section to be used.
      input - - input to be stored.

    • insertTable

      public void insertTable​(java.util.List<java.lang.String> input)
      Will loop through each table and place input inside the first table template found.
      Parameters:
      input - - input to be stored.

    • insertTable

      public void insertTable​(java.util.List<java.lang.String> input, java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> matchRows)
      Will loop through each table and place input inside the first table template found. When found, it will check for if row matches.
      Parameters:
      input - - input to be stored.
      matchRows - - the index rows to match.

    • insertGraph

      public void insertGraph​(int sect, java.util.List<java.lang.String> inputG, int col, boolean vary)
      Inserts graph data into specified section.
      Parameters:
      sect - - section to be used.
      inputG - - input to be stored.
      col - - amount of different data.
      vary - - set to false if there are no more than 1 category.

    • writeInputText

      public void writeInputText()
      Outputs the chapter number, and sections that are active in console.

    • insertToDocument

      public void insertToDocument​(org.apache.poi.xwpf.usermodel.XWPFParagraph paragraph)
      Inserts paragraph from each section to specified paragraph line in document.
      Parameters:
      paragraph - - The paragraph line in document the text should be placed in.
